description:
Florinda`s Gloom lives in the Xanadu Nursery and is looked after by Florinda.
Florinda was worried for her Gloom when she attempted to evolve it using a Leaf Stone. She blamed Gloom not evolving on herself as she thought that she was not training it properly. Brock stated that the Leaf Stone she had bought was fake but Florinda blamed herself again saying she should not be so gullible.
Florinda and her gloom managed to gain some confidence after they beat Jessie, James and Meowth with Gloom`s Solarbeam
name: Kusaihana (Lindow Murasame)
